title: BBW for Tall Gentleman
text:
I fancy myself a well-rounded person (pun might have been intended). I'm goofy and aggressive. Usually not shy and rarely afraid to speak up. I'm into books and video games; movies and plays; roller coasters and mini golf; comic-con and horror movies; art and fashion; my main passion is music in all forms. It could be listening to it, writing it, playing it, singing it etc. I'm all in! 

I'm tall at 5'10"ish and am also what some people would call a mutt. When I fill out forms, I check black as my race and latin as my ethnicity. Close enough! LOL 

I have a 7 year old child (PLEASE don't make assumptions about potential drama with my child's father. ASK and you'll find out why there is none) and also own a small business. I am guilty of devoting all my extra time to my work and forgot to take time to enjoy the life I've worked so hard for. This is where you come in. 

I'm attracted to all races and ethnic backgrounds. I've been dating interracially for years, so it wouldn't be an "experiment" for me. Funny, smart, kind, open minded, good-hearted people (between the ages of 30ish-45) with good communication skills rock my socks! Someone who knows the cool spots in the city or at least wants to learn about them with me is also ideal.

CL or not, I'm not here for games. Believe it or not, there are still jillions of genuine people out there. No one likes their time wasted. I won't waste yours, please be so kind as to not waste mine. 

Please put your favorite sports team in the subject line so I know you aren't spam. Your pic gets mine. Happy searching!
